Name: Kobo Koto Groupe
description:
This group was created in May 2018. It is made of up men who live in the same area. They are united by connections of friendship and family ties. They mainly work in farming.

Ibrahima is the group representative. He is married and the father of 8 children (3 are boys).

With this loan, he plans to buy bags of millet to resell and peanuts (for fertilizer); and manure for farming. The earnings from his work will allow him to support the needs of his family and reinvest in his work.
